metadata.synopsis: Several goblins died from poisoning. This goblin is ordering the others to get to their battle stations because he/she is afraid of an attack.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy, Warrior Sul, Tracker Tak, Brawler Rot, Tracker Puli, Warlock Gurk, Tracker Grikka, Tracker Klagga
0.text: Someone's killing us off - battle stations!
